title: Enhancing Hospitality Practice Competencies: Ecological Learning Design for Large-Scale Scientific Leadership Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners apply an ecological learning design framework to identify critical issues in large-scale science projects and propose solutions.
Learners systematically collect and manage learning evidence across project phases using smartphone-based tools (e.g., collaboration apps, data collection tools).
Learners collaboratively develop strategies for solving uncertain scientific problems through peer interaction while performing leadership roles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
